author: Tom Embury-Dennis, Tom Embury-Dennis
title: Coronavirus: Trump doubles down on call for supporters to 'liberate' Democratic states in lockdown
description: US president's extraordinary outbursts branded an attempt at 'fomenting rebellion'
content:
Donald Trump has doubled down on his tweets calling for right-wing supporters to liberate three Democrat-led states under coronavirus lockdown measures.
During a wild and at times incoherent press conference performance on Friday, the US president spouted a … [+6759 chars]
